select ni.id, ni.user_code, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.name, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages from notify_info ni left join user_info ui on (ui.code = ni.user_code) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notifyInfo.userName},'%')
AND ni.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{notifyInfo.content},'%')
order by ni.create_date desc

select ni.id, ni.user_code, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.name, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages from notify_info ni left join user_info ui on (ui.code = ni.user_code) where 1 = 1 AND ui.id = #{userId} order by ni.create_date desc
